::Striker::

Striker stops as he hears Spears' story, his wolf face frowning. Could he 
accept Spears, if she'd been a Predacon in the pase? Maximals who betrayed 
seemed to have no trouble following the principles of their new factions, as 
in the case of Perndabot, or Armdabot and Perhanabot before the two bots were 
fuzed into the Alliance warrior, so why wouldn't Predacons? He nods.

"I will try to," he says, "Let's get going. Something might be up at the Ark."

Striker starts walking again, heading toward the Ark.
